title: Shrine of the Paper Makers
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal

Left ma LLC, in grey: [Shrine of the Paper-Makers, Fukui]
description: dusk; wide street with buildings on L side and a man crouching over a bucket on a porch; very  tall inscribed white banner near center across from a torii gate; near center, a family of 6 walks down the street, away from the torii gate; at right, a large inscribed egg-shaped rock and a garden; more buildings, people, and mountains in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
